    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Life and Death in the Atlantic World &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17308898">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308898">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308898">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308898">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308898" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308899">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308899">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308899">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308899">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308899" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17308900">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308900">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308900">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for generating topics and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308900">
          <div id="boxatt17308900" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22584226">
              <a id="link_22584226" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22584226,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Life and Death in the Atlantic World', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382420">
              <a id="link_20382420" href="http://www.iep.utm.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382420,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Life and Death in the Atlantic World', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730249}); ">
               Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A free resource. Scholarly. Peer-reviewed. Good introduction to methodological approaches. Search on "literary theory."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308901">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308901">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308901">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308901">
          <p>
           Primary documents can be found abundantly by using any standard web search engine like Google. However,
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
            Encompass
           </a>
           or
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip">
            WorldCat
           </a>
           (see description below) can be good sources for primary documents published in book form.
          </p>
          <p>
           One excellent website offering access to primary documentation is
           <a href="http://slavevoyages.org/tast/index.faces">
            Trans-Atlantic Slave Trade Database
           </a>
           , sponsored by Emory University and others.
          </p>
          <p>
           Our library subscribes to a primary documents database called
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://eebo.chadwyck.com/home">
            Early English Books Online
           </a>
           , covering up to 1700, and
           <a id="link_12344563" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=ECCO" target="_blank">
            Eighteenth Century Collections Online (ECCO)
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           The&nbsp;
           <a id="link_12344564" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.accessible.com/accessible/preLog" target="_blank">
            Pennsylvania Gazette
           </a>
           , available online by library subscription. served as the paper of record in the 18th and early 19th century in the British colonies and early U.S.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://books.google.com/">
            Google Books
           </a>
           contains a wealth of pre-copyright (pre-1923) materials.
          </p>
          <p>
           See also the
           <em>
            footnotes of secondary sources
           </em>
           , which often will point to primary documentation.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308901" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308902">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308902">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308902">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308902">
          <div id="boxatt17308902" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22569910">
              <a id="link_22569910" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22569910,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Life and Death in the Atlantic World', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308903">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308903">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308903">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308903">
          <div id="boxatt17308903" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20382446">
              <a id="link_20382446" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382446,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Life and Death in the Atlantic World', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription databse. The standard index for peer-reviewed articles and book chapters on U.S. and Canadian history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382406">
              <a id="link_20382406" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382406,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Life and Death in the Atlantic World', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription database. Standard index for peer-reviewed articles and scholarly books on Latin American history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382451">
              <a id="link_20382451" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382451,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Life and Death in the Atlantic World', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286586}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription databse. Archive of the full text of numerous history journals from major academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308904">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308904">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308904">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites more likely to be scholarly
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308904">
          <div id="boxatt17308904" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20382407">
              <a id="link_20382407" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382407,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Life and Death in the Atlantic World', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4698734" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17308959">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308959">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308959">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in Chicago style (foot/endnotes and bibliography format)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308959">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Or visit the
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           at Purdue.
          </p>
          <p>
           The full text of the Chicago Manual of Style, 16th ed. is available to Muhlenberg College students
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Help with annotated bibliographies
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Visit Purdue's
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
             <em>
              Online Writing Lab
             </em>
            </a>
            for definitions and
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
             format
            </a>
            of an annotation.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308959" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308906">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308906">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308906">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308906">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308906" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
